attributes.action: Help for people suffering from long covid raise awareness of this condition
attributes.additional_details: No end of people can’t work due to this condition yet the government are not doing anything to help them. No end of bosses at work do not believe in this condition and certain doctors etc keep telling people the symptoms are due to anxiety etc when we no it’s not. More needs to be done such as more clinics and testing etc.
attributes.background: Money to help those who can’t work due to long covid and raise awareness. Also some kind of plan to prevent people being dismissed from there jobs.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Provide financial support & fund research into interventions to treat long COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581110

Make long covid an occupational illness: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575778
